ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.diamond: Uses powerful alchemy to convert alchemical stone into valuable materials. Add levels of amplify to improve the resulting item. Can be further amplified by wearing a focus of alchemy. Can only target blocks placed in-world, NOT items.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.wither_summon: Summons the wither, add cursed bind to force it to obey you.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.rot: Kills crops and earth, and applies hunger effect
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.advanced_amplify: A more powerful version of amplify that uses significanlty more mana.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.curse: On entities, applies bad luck, and on blocks, turns them into silverfish variants
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.demonic_curse: A powerful harming effect that is almost impossible to cure. If augmented with sensitive, can convert dirt into cursed earth, as well as create vengeful soul sand.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.heartstop: Disrupts target's heart, and can be combined with effects like shocked for massive damage.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.flatten: Deals damage based on the hardness of the block below.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.lead_skin: Creates a protective layer on the target. Low max level, but can be increased with focus of alchemy.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.carve: Carves faces into compatible blocks, such as pumpkins, and strips wood.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.animate_block: Can bring golems built out of unusual materials to life. This includes golems carved out of clay, which can be made with a carved magic clay block on top of two magic clay blocks of that same type.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.brambles: Spawns brambles, which act similar to cactus but can grow anywhere. Can be made thicker and stronger with amplify.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.transmute: Converts between metals and other interconnected items, does not work on placed blocks. These include iron and gold, blaze powder and nether wart, blaze rods and ender pearls, or chorus flowers and wither skulls. The stronger recipes require levels of amplification, as well as wearing a focus of alchemy. For more info you can check the uses in JEI.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.propagate_self: Casts the rest of the spell from the self form. Can have another propagate afterwards to make it behave like a default form.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.propagate_project: Casts the rest of the spell as a projectile from the target.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.propagate_orbit: Converts the remainder of the spell to a different form.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.swap_target: Swaps the roles of the caster and target, allowing for more complex logic. Fails with the toss glyph, and is blocked by chunk protection.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.enchant: Enchants items, including special items such as honey, and at high enough levels, even golden apples. Can be buffed with amplify.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.overhead: Targets the spell on the block above the player.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.missile: Similar to projectile, but with a short duration and will explode when it expires, casting the spell in the air (or on a nearby target, if found).
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.propagate_missile: Casts the rest of the spell as a missile from the target.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.propagate_underfo: Moves the spell to the block below the target. Moves more blocks downwards with amplify.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.propagate_overhea: Moves the spell to the block above the target. Moves more blocks upwards with amplify.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.melt: Melts stone-like blocks, eventually reaching lava. Can be amplified to complete multiple steps, and requires multiple levels of amplify to melt obsidian.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.disenchant: Removes enchantments from an item, use sensitive to remove only curses.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.adrenaline: Gives many useful buffs, but when they run out applies debuffs
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.acid: Destroys some blocks, kinda useless TBH
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.scald: Scalds the target with boiling water, leaving them burned. Burned targets take more fire damage.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.hellfire: A truly terrifying spell, burns things with incredible heat.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.soulfire: Creates soulfire on the target, which deals more damage than normal fire. Apply further fire duration for best results.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.vine_grab: Grabs the target with vines, preventing their movement. Does not work on burning entities.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.drown: Deals damage based on target's depth in water
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.hell_flare: An advanced version of Flare that does more damage and can transfer Soulfire.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.fireball: A large upgrade on explode, larger blast radius and damage plus sets blocks on fire.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.demonic_light: Summons a demonic light, which can actually be any color. Can be augmented with sensitive to only hit entities, applying both night vision and glowing.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.cursed_bind: Binds certain summons and creations to the will of the caster using demonic power. Even affects the wither glyph!
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.true_underfoot: Targets the block below the player
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.tornado: Summons a tornado that grabs all nearby entities and damages them. Can be augmented with AOE, amplify, and accelerate.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.raise_earth: Raises a pillar of earth, pushing away any nearby entities. Can be augmented with AOE, pierce, and amplify.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.divine_smite: An upgraded lightning that can be augmented with sensitive to not harm items
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.advanced_grow: A better version of the grow glyph that can grow sugarcane, cactus, nether wart, and chorus plants, but uses more mana.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.earthquake: Cracks the earth and damages nearby mobs
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.dilate_time: A stronger version of extend time that uses way more mana.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.projectile_burst: Fires a weak burst of many projectiles, goes well with split.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.dispellant: Stops the target's effects from being dispelled.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.regen: Applies the regen effect, up to level 3.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.whirlpool: Summons a whirlpool that, when in water, pulls all nearby entities underwater and damages them. Can be augmented with AOE, amplify, and accelerate.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.demonic_cleanse: Removes effects that are not normally curable, even summoning sickness, but has a long cooldown.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.demonic_anchoring: Prevents the target from using the Blink glyph, or any warp scrolls.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.temporal_collapse: An incredibly powerful version of duration down, removes an incredible amount of time from an effect.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.blood_clot: Blocks the regen effect from healing the target, and massively increases the damage of heartstop.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.lesser_aoe: A weaker, but easier to obtain, version of AOE.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.greater_aoe: A stronger version of AOE for creating huge spells.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.absorption: Adds the absorption potion effect, allowing you to tank a large hit.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.advanced_evaporat: Evaporates fluids in an area, and sometimes leaves behind usable items.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.random_color_effe: Changes the color to a new random color
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.random_color_augm: Randomizes the color of the spell on cast
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.random_25: Has a 25% chance to continue the spell, otherwise cancels it
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.random_50: Has a 50% chance to continue the spell, otherwise cancels it
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.random_75: Has a 75% chance to continue the spell, otherwise cancels it
item.arsomega.maria_rosa: The Complete Works of Maria Rosa
item.arsomega.kaz_carter: The Complete Works of Kaz Carter
death.attack.demonic_curse: %1$s was killed by a demonic curse
death.attack.demonic_curse.player: %1$s was killed by a demonic curse whilst fighting %2$s
death.attack.scald.player: %1$s was scalded by hot water by %2$s
death.attack.tornado: %1$s was torn apart by the wind
death.attack.tornado.player: %1$s was torn apart by the wind whilst fighting %2$s
effect.arsomega.demonic_curse.descriptio: Damages the target over time, and cannot easily be cured.
effect.arsomega.adrenaline.description: Represents the adrenaline-fueled state of the target, doesn't provide benefits on it's own.
effect.arsomega.perma_flight.description: Allows the player to fly, and is not cured with milk.
effect.arsomega.lead_skin.description: Reduces damage from any sources blocked by armor.
effect.arsomega.no_magic_break.descripti: Prevents the player from using magic to break or otherwise damage blocks. No effect on tools, however.
effect.arsomega.stone_petrification.desc: Represents the player being turned to stone. There is no cure for a complete transformation.
effect.arsomega.burned.description: Target takes 50% more damage from fire sources. Stacks with soulfire.
effect.arsomega.soulfire.description: Flames on the target burn hotter, and the target takes double fire damage from all sources. Stacks with burned.
effect.arsomega.vine_bind.description: The target is bound with vines, and cannot move. While it cannot be removed with curative items, the vines can be seared off if the target catches fire.
effect.arsomega.dispellant.description: Prevents the target's effects from being dispelled using magic, however milk works as normal.
effect.arsomega.demonic_cleanse.descript: Represents the target having cleansed themselves with demonic magic. No effects on its own.
effect.arsomega.demonic_anchoring.descri: Prevents the user from teleporting themselves with the Blink glyph or with warp scrolls.
arsomega.advancement.desc.banished: End up in the demon realm
arsomega.advancement.desc.better_forgott: Some knowledge is better left not found...
arsomega.advancement.desc.forbidden_know: Things even the Arcane Library doesn't share
arsomega.advancement.desc.shattered: A shard of something greater. Could it be restored?
arsomega.advancement.desc.contact: Make first contact with the being on the other side
arsomega.advancement.desc.destiny: Receive an offer that can change the very course of destiny
